shortDescription: Opera 9.52 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a series of automatic submissions of a form containing a KEYGEN element, a related issue to CVE-2009-1828.
vulnerabilityName: Opera KEYGEN Element Form Submission Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
